rules_text:
Flying, lifelink
When Daystrider Pegasus enters the battlefield, exile another target non-Pegasus permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control.
notes:
CN24: removed enchantment flicker gain 3 life rider, 2/3—>2/2, added lifelink
also see: Artem Chebokha
(Exiling Auras that boost toughness on creatures that would have lethal damage on them without the boost will cause that creature to die.)
